perturbation.original_text: Celebrity represents and warrants that during the Term and in the Territory, Celebrity will not endorse or make any appearances or advertisements on behalf of any other multivitamin.
perturbation.changed_text: Celebrity represents and warrants that during the Term and in the Territory, Celebrity will not endorse or make any appearances or advertisements on behalf of any other similar dietary supplement.
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'multivitamin' to 'similar dietary supplement' broadens the scope in a way that is undefined and contradictory under generally accepted understanding of 'multivitamin'. A multivitamin has a clear and precise definition, whereas 'similar dietary supplement' is extremely vague, creating potential for disputes about what constitutes a violation of the exclusivity clause.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General Contract Law - Ambiguity and Vagueness

perturbation.original_text: HDS agrees to provide and maintain at its own expense, the following insurance coverages: A. Commercial General Liability coverage of product liability with limits no less than $1,000,000 per occurrence and $2,000,000 aggregate. B. Umbrella / Excess Liability coverage inclusive of product liability with limits not less than $5,000,000 per occurrence and aggregate. C. Media Liability insurance with limits not less than $2,000,000 per occurrence and aggregate. The Celebrity shall be named as an additional insured on coverages A, B and C. Celebrity is afforded waiver of subrogation on coverages A, B and C. All policies listed under A, B and C should have a thirty (30) day notice of cancellation provision or endorsement. HDS will provide Celebrity's agent, CSE, with a certificate of insurance within five (5) days of its request for same.
perturbation.changed_text: HDS agrees to provide and maintain at its own expense, the following insurance coverages: A. Standard Business Liability coverage of product liability with limits no less than $1,000,000 per incident. B. Additional Liability coverage inclusive of product liability with limits not less than $5,000,000 total. C. Media Insurance with limits not less than $2,000,000 total. The Celebrity shall be covered under coverages A, B and C. HDS will endeavor to provide Celebrity's agent, CSE, with evidence of insurance.
perturbation.explanation: Changing the insurance types to vague descriptions like 'Standard Business Liability' and removing the specific 'per occurrence and aggregate' limits contradicts standard insurance definitions. Also, replacing a defined timeframe of 30 days' notice with an undefined 'endeavor' introduces uncertainty and weakens Celebrity's protection.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General Contract Law - Definite and Certain Terms, Insurance Law - Standard Policy Requirements

perturbation.original_text: Nothing contained in this Agreement shall be deemed or construed to place the parties in the relationship of partners, joint venturers, principal-agents, or employer-employee, it being understood that the parties hereto are and will remain independent contractors in all respects and neither party shall have any right to obligate or bind the other in any manner whatsoever.
perturbation.changed_text: Nothing contained in this Agreement shall be deemed or construed to place the parties in the relationship of partners, joint venturers, principal-agents, or employer-employee, it being understood that the parties hereto may operate with some degree of independence and neither party shall have any explicit right to obligate or explicitly bind the other in any particular specified manner whatsoever.
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'independent contractors in all respects' to 'may operate with some degree of independence' fundamentally alters the defined relationship between the parties. The term 'independent contractor' has legal significance, particularly regarding liability and tax obligations. The modified term 'may operate with some degree of independence' lacks this defined legal standing and implies a level of control that could blur the line with employer-employee relationships, particularly when combined with the modifier on the obligate term. This creates legal uncertainty.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General Contract Law - Definite and Certain Terms, Agency Law - Independent Contractor vs. Employee
